mentorInfo.meetYourMentor:
**Functional Purpose**: Title introducing the mentor to the student.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Session page → Mentor Info section (subtitle)
**When Users See This**: When a student views their mentoring session details.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Meet your mentor"
discussionActions.ended:
**Functional Purpose**: Indicates that a discussion has concluded.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Session page → Discussion Actions section
**When Users See This**: When a mentoring discussion is finished by either the mentor or student.
**Technical Context**: Appears with a graphical checkmark icon.
**Current English**: "Ended"
discussionActions.reviewDiscussion:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text for reviewing a timed-out discussion.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Session page → Discussion Actions section (button hint)
**When Users See This**: When a mentoring discussion has timed out.
**Technical Context**: This text is for a button hint; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Review discussion"
discussionActions.endDiscussion:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text for ending an active discussion.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Session page → Discussion Actions section (button hint)
**When Users See This**: When an active mentoring discussion is ongoing and the user can end it.
**Technical Context**: This text is for a button hint; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "End discussion"
mentoringComboButton.continueCodeReview:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to navigate to an in-progress code review.
**UI Location**: Solution page → Mentoring Combo Button (primary segment)
**When Users See This**: When a student has an active, in-progress code review session.
**Technical Context**: This is a clickable link to the discussion URL.
**Current English**: "Continue code review"
mentoringComboButton.viewRequest:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to view a pending mentor request.
**UI Location**: Solution page → Mentoring Combo Button (primary segment)
**When Users See This**: When a student has submitted a code review request that is awaiting a mentor.
**Technical Context**: This is a clickable link to the pending mentor request URL.
**Current English**: "View request"
mentoringComboButton.submitForCodeReview:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to initiate a new code review request.
**UI Location**: Solution page → Mentoring Combo Button (primary segment)
**When Users See This**: When a student has no active or pending code review for the current solution.
**Technical Context**: This is a clickable link to the request mentoring URL.
**Current English**: "Submit for Code Review"
